title: ENERLITES 20 Amp Toggle Light Switch, Single Pole, 20A 120-277V, Grounding Screw, Commercial Grade, UL Listed, 81200-GY, Gray

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: #88,662 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)   #292 in Electrical Light Switches

description: ENERLITES 81200 20A toggle switch can replace any switch of the same style. Ideal for use in residential settings and some commercial areas. Switches come in packaged boxes and are clearly marked with the specifications and compliance. Made of high-quality material and build to last. 20A, 120V-277V (AC), Single Pole. Wiring instructions included. UL Listed
shipping_info: FREE Wednesday, June 11 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Light Switches
feature_bullets: Commercial grade On/Off toggle light switch is made of high-quality materials; impact resistant polycarbonate thermoplastic and solid steel. Frame dimensions: 3.65” H x 1.30” W x .90”
Shallow body design fits standard junction boxes. Back insert and side terminal wiring (copper only). Break-off plaster ears. Grounding screw
Suitable for offices, schools, stores, shops, restaurants, public facilities, hotels, and residential areas that allow 20A switches.
Use with ENERLITES wall plates for the best fitting and color match, part numbers 8811-GY, 8811M-GY and 8811O-GY covers
20A, 120V-277V (AC), Single Pole. Wiring instructions included. 1-year warranty. UL Listed

customer_reviews.review_snippet: I found it hard to find a 20 A switch that is not decor.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsA great replacement switch
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2023
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Worked well to replace the broken switch in our garage. The receptacle was not trivial to remove but we were able to do so and once done the switch was easy to install. Definitely worth every penny

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsIt will last long. I like it.
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2021
customer_reviews.review_snippet: It will last long. I like it. If you need it, get it, you will not return, it’s built is excellent.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: After a year, the light switch stopped working. Had the electrical checked, the switch just stopped working.I bought two, but one was defective.
